args.text:
Welcome to
GBStudio!

Have you seen my
cat anywhere?

He's by the house?
Thank you!
Meow!

I guess it was a
misunderstanding.

What is that guy
looking at?

Check out this
sweet duck!

It's dangerous to
go without docs.

Check out
gbstudio.dev/docs

Also, try moving
the rock outside.

Have you tried
using this radio?

Yeah it doesn't
fit does it?

But it's all I
have right now...

Add sprites to
assets/sprites

Add backgrounds to
assets/backgrounds

This room is
pretty empty.

Try to edit
house.png

Try to get the ice
block to the mark.

If you get stuck,
I'll reset it!
Success!

text:
Golly, you must be
so confused.

Someone ought to
teach you how

I guess little old
me will have to do

args.text:
Ready?
Here we go!
